Pope si Mahadum Cornell, e nyere ya ọnọdụ nke Fellow na American Physical Society, mgbe Division of Fluid Dynamics họpụtara ha na 1991, maka onyinye nke uru nchekwa na usoro ọrụ nwere ike ime na modeling turbulence, iji ghọta geometri na mgbagwoju anya nke elu na ahụ maka I ogbaaghara na iwepụta ọnụ ọgụgụ Lagrangian site na simulashon ọnụogụgụ. Ọ bụ onye natara 2008 Ya

Zeldovich Gold Medal site na nke Combushon Institut na propelants nakwa ihe nrite nke combushon (2012) site na Amirika nke Aeronautics and Astronautics. Ọ nọ ugbu a na kọmitii nchịkọta akụkọ nke Combushon thiori na Modelling
A họpụtara Pope ka ọ bụrụ onye otu National Academy of Engineering na 2010 maka onyinye maka imepụta ihe na-agagharị agagharị, gụnyere mmepe nke usoro ọrụ dị iche iche maka ọkụ ọkụ.
